website_summaries.verdict: A good budget breast pump tote bag option made with some premium materials. Uses a subtle design pattern.
pros: Comes with a convenient staging mat to keep everything organized when using a portable pump
The interior compartment includes a couple of divider pockets so you can store smaller items along with the main equipment
cons: Interior lining can start to tear around the stitching after some time
Some found it to be too big and bulky

customer_reviews.title: At first when I got this bag I thought it was too big and was unsure about keeping it but now I love it because it is so big
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the other reviews that state it doesn't fit the spectra...I have a spectra S2 pump and it fits perfectly. At first when I got this bag I thought it was too big and was unsure about keeping it but now I love it because it is so big. I can easily fit my cooler, pump, parts, my lunch, water bottle etc. everything I need in one bag instead of carrying 3 bags around like a crazy bag lady at work. Im very happy with it for the price given all the other pump bags to fit a spectra were 100-150 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Spectra pumping bag
customer_reviews.text: Finally- a pumping bag that fits my Spectra and my budget!! Great every day bag. I've been using it for 3 months as my work bag/purse, and it suits me well. As others have noted, it's a big bag, but it holds everything I need to pump at work and get back and forth each day, so it's worth it. The material is nothing fancy, bit of you are looking for function and reasonable pricing, this is your bag!
customer_reviews.author: V.R.

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect bag!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this bag and so happy it worked out! I tried 3 other breast pump tote bags and none of them worked, they were either too big and bulky or didn’t have enough space to hold my work stuff. This bag is the perfect size, it can hold my Madela pump in style pump, my bottle cooler bag, my freemie cups, bottles and tubes..... but in addition it will also hold my 15in laptop, my laptop charger, 2 notebooks, and other small essentials in the pockets. It’s made of a quality material (haven’t put it to the test yet though), and it looks great. This is a great bag for the price and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Provenzano

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for Spectra 2 pump
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag as I wasn't finding many affordable options for my Spectra 2 breast pump. It's been a wonderful purchase so far as I take it back and forth to work every day. Fits my pump, all my parts and accessories with ease while being stylish as well. Has 2 insulated compartments which help keep my milk cold with the use of ice packs. I would highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big but Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Very big, but i like that. This way i don't have to carry around 3 bags like i was doing before. Now i can get away with just this, or this and my purse. Perfect for work, no one knows its my pump bag - but i'm sure they may have put two and two together since i started carrying it once i returned from leave. Fits my Spectra S2 double pump. I do have it turned slightly since the electrical plug is on the side of the pump. Turn it so that its not head on, but slightly turned so you still have access to the buttons. Will update with pictures later.
customer_reviews.author: GSI

customer_reviews.title: Can’t say enough!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag so much! It’s big and fits my spectra perfectly! It fits everything I need to pump and so much more. I plan to use this when I go back to work and put my wallet and lunch in it as well. I imagine e that I’ll be using this bag long after I’m done pumping!!!! Buy this bag!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Only had a few days, but the room is amazing. My spectra fits wonderfully, and inside I have plenty of room for a cooler, pump supplies, an iPad, and my lunch. Would recommend to anyone needing something to take to work, and replace their old work bag yet fit everything you need beside pump stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Organized!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product!!! This bag is perfect at keeping all of my breast pump equipment organized in a discreet manner. Pumping at work can be a challenge but this bag makes it much more convenient. I love that the pump fits directly into the bag and does not need to be removed to use. Great purchase, so glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is big, but I thought it would be giant based on other reviews. It is big but very manageable. The material is great, and the pockets work for all of my accessories. I bought a couple of wet/dry bags to put my pump parts in so I don't get the bag dirty. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lori K. Folbrick

customer_reviews.title: Finally. Affordable S2 bag
customer_reviews.text: One if the only bags that fits the spectra s2 for less than $100. In it I have the s2 in the side pouch along with flanges, tubes, bf protectors and power cord. I dont have to take the pump all the way out to use. The the actual bag I have all my accessories like extra flanges, wipes, pump cleaners, cooler, creams, etc. If I wanted, I could ditch my diaper bag and throw baby items in as well. Giving this bag a 4 out of 5 simply because it's still new and I cannot attest to wear and tear/material quality/ longevity/ etc. just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Swms

customer_reviews.title: This pump bag is everything!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is everything! I can fit everything I need which includes the pump, pump parts, a cleaner, storage bags AND laptop, iPad, charger, headphone, keys, wallet and iPhone. Also I carry a book for reading and water and snacks and there is still room! I place the pumped bottles in the other side compartment and I never have to worry about another bag. The material is great and looks very professional and classic for the corporate environment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is ENORMOUS!! I needed a bigger bag for my pump, because I was using an old Medela bag for a Spectra pump. The bag just didn't fit the bigger, rounder pump that well. This bag fits everything, which is great, but it's really too big. I can fit all my pump stuff, a lunch bag, my wallet, and still have room. I kind of look like I'm packed to stay for the week when I walk into work in the morning. It's a nice quality fabric, and a nice print. Overall a very good purchase. I was just taken aback at the size when it came.
customer_reviews.author: R. Drake

customer_reviews.title: the material is fine, just cheap feeling
customer_reviews.text: It does the job carrying my pump and things to and from work but it's a very cheaply made bag. The little feet on the bottom of the bag started too break off the first day I used it. the material is fine, just cheap feeling. BUT - I didn't want to spend a lot on a bag specifically for pumping so I knew what I was buying. It's got plenty of pockets and stores my Medela pump perfectly. It's not as great for the Spectra pump I have though - it fits but it takes up way more space b/c you can't really put it in the side pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Spectra Owners Beware! There’s better options
customer_reviews.text: Spectra does not fit unless you really shove it in there. Not practical if you have an S2 that needs to be plugged in. The Zohzo Lauren Breast pump bag is way better and a much better price point too. Although this bag looks slightly more professional, it’s heavy, rigid, and not going to make my life any easier going back to work.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: My only real complaint is the fabric looks like a cooler bag and I’m not a huge fan ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for a work trip to use as a combination pump and laptop bag. It worked prettt well. It fit my midsize work laptop, Spectra S2, Medela hand pump and a Medela cooler in addition to a few other things. The fit was a bit tight but it did the job. I now use it for going back and forth to work and it works extremely well. My only real complaint is the fabric looks like a cooler bag and I’m not a huge fan of the print. If it came in different colors or fabric patterns I’d have rated it a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Emily GH

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bag EXCEPT one thing. The side pockets (where you hold your pump or keep your milk) has quite a bit of lining that hangs over the tracks of the zipper on the inside, and no matter how careful I am, it's constantly getting caught in the zipper and making the zipper inoperable. It's so frustrating for whatever is in there to be "trapped" while I wrestle with it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Get it now!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has been my companion for over a year now. I’ve travelled at least 10 times in the past year and this bag has seen it all. I love the pump compartment, the laptop sleeve, the pockets, the trolley strap, the look, the feel. I’m getting sad my pumping journey is coming to an end and I’ll be hanging up my pump parts soon. This bag has lasted and has not shown any wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fits spectra s1
customer_reviews.text: Fits my spectra perfect!! The only thing is that once the side pockets are full there isn’t a ton of room left in the bag. But all my pumping stuff fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Blochlinger

customer_reviews.title: The quality is great and I am sure I will love
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to hold my laptop and pumping supplies for when I returned to work after maternity leave. The quality is great and I love it
customer_reviews.author: McQuadeH

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Storage and well thought out bag for pumping mamas!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comparable cost-efficient option. Very thought out bag and holds everything I need for work. The only reason I gave it a 4 is some of the piping is already breaking 1 week in. However, this bag is only being used for a season (pumping season) so for the price, it's not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: It works for what I need but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding a bad that would fit my Spectra, pump parts, bottles, and computer and other work items. This works but just barely. It fits the pump just fine, but there is no way to get a cooler with 6 small bottles in as well. I know the pocket is insulated, but the bottles would be sliding around all over so I use a separate cooler that I carry. I am able to fit my computer and notebook but it's tight. You really can't utilize all the pockets once the pump is in there. The perfect pump bag for me just does not exist!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Fits Spectra and medela cooler comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used for a week, but overall good quality. I can fit all my pump parts comfortably, but it’s definitely very full. I have a Spectra 2 and the medela cooler with 4 bottles. Not very practical to carry my computer to meetings, as every time I open it my pump parts are overflowing and I can’t fit much else besides a computer ( but it does fit if you don’t mind everyone seeing all your pump parts). I do carry 2 sets of everything, so you may have more space if you only carry one set.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for pump plus work bag
customer_reviews.text: Only used this for a week so far, but like it a lot. It has plenty of space for a Medela Pump in Style pump, the FreeMe pump parts, a cooler pack, and a hakaa silicone pump as backup in just the side compartments, so I can use the main compartment for my laptop and all other purse items. Easy to clean. Feels well made and sturdy. Insulation is good but not great, so the freezer pack warmed up only slightly slower than if it had been out in the open and the other bag contents were cold. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Practical travel and pumping bag
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag for business trip and to use at the office. Love the spacious insulated compartments, they are perfect for cooler bags and breast pump. There are also a few zippered pockets for other accessories. It also fits under the seat on the airplane, so can be brought on trips as a personal item. Very utilitarian and practical bag! Seems good quality so far, will have to update after seeing how it stands up to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: jing

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holy huge bag! I wanted a brassy pump bag... this is definitely big enough to fit the spectra S2 in it... and everything you need for 2 days away from home with a baby! Seriously, this thing is the size of a small duffle bag! I'm returning it, because I'll never use it. All I needed was a place to keep my pump and accessories together. This won't work for me, but might for you if you need to pack a ton of stuff in addition to your pump.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf7Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Large but fits Spectra S1 pump well.
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a lot larger than I thought but it does fit the Spectra S1 very well in one of the side compartments. It's very spacious and could fit a lot of things. I don't carry much to work so it will most likely be used for weekend trips or outings.
customer_reviews.author: TurtlePenguin

customer_reviews.title: STEADY, BIG, WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was everything I wanted!!! Big, steady and definitely “work” appealing. I’ma first time mom returning back to work soon and I needed to pack all my equipment and accessories all in one bag. It will fit my Mandela, my parts, bottles for a long 6-8 hr day to pump and other necessities I might need. This will be my purse and mommy bag for work all in one!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: It's not too big, as other reviews lead you to believe.
customer_reviews.text: So I almost did not order this since so many reviews commented on how large it was. I am glad I did order it though, because with the Spectra pump, the cooler bag, all the pumping accessories, and my work laptop and gear - I can barely get it zipped shut. So, actually I wish it was an inch or two taller. I also wish it had an actual laptop sleeve, which is why I did not give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It will work for what I need it to work for. I thought there was a pocket for a laptop, it is about the size to fit an iPad. I am able to put it in the large pocket and it stays in place. I also thought it came with a small cooler to fit in the pockets, but it didn't. The insulated pockets are great though! Overall it fits everything I need for work, pumping, and lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Afton Evans

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and large capacity
customer_reviews.text: Was my work-pump bag for a few months and has tolerated a lot of abuse. I have carried two laptops + spectra s1 + medela cooler bag + 4 spectra pump bottles in it before so it can definitely hold lots of stuff. My gripe is that the zippers need to be improved! It’s always very difficult to zip up my pump / cooler bag compartments and the zippers have come off when I closed them in a rush because it gets caught with the fabric. I’ve since changed to a backpack from Sarah wells as it distributes weight more evenly considering the amount of stuff I carry. This bag is definitely more stylish in an understated fashion though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag except that the zipper is already broken after 3 weeks of use. The zippers stick a bit and one of the side pockets the fabric around the zipper is already broken, like it couldn’t support the item in the side pocket which was the spectra 2 pump. Still working but probably not for long. Being that I need to zip and unzip this bag at least 5 times a day, I wish it had much better durability.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good overall with some issues
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and function of this work pump holding bag. The price is better than other pumpbags. The bag really smelled badly of plastic when I first received it and had it wash it several times before I wanted to pump my pump equipment into it. Also, after only a month of use the flap securing the metal ring that attaches the shoulder strap broke. If not for those two issues, I would recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea R Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect. I was looking for something to use when I go back to work so I wasn't having to carry the pump plus a cooler bag. I can put my pump (Medela Advanced Pump in style) in it plus it has room for storage bottles, ice packs, a space for pictures of the little one, and space for spare parts. I love that it has a staging mat so you can have everything set up & ready to go! It's comfy to carry too & not too shabby on the style. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Terrific bag and absolutely has fitted my needs!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is bigger than I expected, but it's exactly what I was needing. The only things I would change, would be making the bottle pockets inside all able to fit wide bottles (all 3 are different widths, it's weird), make is possible to wear as a backpack and also make the pump pocket on the side a little taller. The Spectra S2 fits in the pocket well, but trying to get it back out is a hassle as there is not enough room around the handle to pull it back out. I also have uet to figure out what they plastic pickets inside the pump and cooler pockets are for. All in all, this is a terrific bag.
customer_reviews.author: EJsMm

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit perfectly. Stylish, with easy clean fabric. Even room for laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I did take one star away because it is very narrow and definitely doesn’t hold as much as the sarah wells bags. However I think this bag looks much more professional and isn’t as obvious that it’s a pump bag. In fact, I had a coworker, who doesn’t have children, ask me where I got it because she wants to order one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Banfi

customer_reviews.title: It’s the perfect bag for the on the go working mom!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag it is great quality and the price was very reasonable. I love that I can easily store my ice packs and milk in a lunch tote on the opposite side of my pump. I appreciate all of the compartments on the inside of the bag to store pumping supplies and snacks while at work. It’s the perfect bag for the on the go working mom! Edit: After 4 months of use being back to work full time I was disappointed that the side zipper compartments where I put my pump and cooler bag started to tear. Now I’m in search of something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ali H.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for working/traveling mothers
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag. Exactly what I needed. I was tired of carrying two bags to work, one for the pump and one for my office stuff. I have also used it during travel with my infant. Very durable and elegant. The material is well made and the quality is comparable to top brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and versitile bag. It’s very large and roomy, there is more than enough room for your pump, parts, cooler, diapers, blanket, and and extra items you can think of. It fits my spectra S2 easily. I’m leaving 4 stars because my bag arrived with one of the pockets sewn to the zipper so I could not open the pocket all the way so it was a little disappointing. I processed a return and since I like the bag so much I reordered a new before the return even processed because I needed it right away for a trip I was taking.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: My spectra pump fit in this fine. If you didn’t have to carry a computer, expandable is washing bin, and all the things for pumping and storing this bag would be ok. The handles are kind of orange and not the greatest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is pretty amazing and especially for the price point. It fits my spectra, with flanges, my freemie liberty and Sarah Wells cooler perfectly inside with way more room to spare. I originally purchased it to travel with and fits great on my luggage handle and fits perfectly under an airplane seat. I was able to keep my milk cold in the insulated pocket with a cooler inside for almost 12 hours. I did have to turn the cooler to the side to fit but I just arrange my milk that it was going to stay upright. Is highly recommend this bag for work or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Great breast pump bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this breast pump bag! I got a free breast pump with my health insurance and it didn't come with a bag. I ordered this one, and have not been disappointed! It can fit everything and more - it's huge. I wish the side pockets were a little bigger so that my cooler bag would fit, but it fits just fine in the large pocket, so it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: KelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Consolidate to ONE bag!
customer_reviews.text: This holds everything. I'm not a paid ad, I'm a mom of a four month old who has a high stress job. This bag is now my purse, pump holder/hider, laptop bag, diaper bag and lunchbox! The shoulder strap is a little too long, but no complaints otherwise. This has taken the place of four bags and it looks very professional in multiple settings. I don't think twice about taking this to a board room.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Tegerdine

customer_reviews.title: Pricey and Cheap... BOO
customer_reviews.text: I work a corporate job that’s professional dress. Thought this would be a nice compliment to that profesh vibe. First, it smelled so badly like cheap plastic and the quality of the P”leather” was terrible. Zippers got caught too. Overall looks cheap when you get up close and for all that money I would have expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the Spectra breast pump. Pump fits great in side pocket. The other side pocket has room for flanges and bottles. There is plenty of room in the middle pocket for additional stuff. Bag is very durable and of good quality. Highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie m

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect pump bag for working mamas. My spectra pump fits perfectly in one of the side compartments and my cooler bag fits perfectly in the other side compartment and the middle section stores all of my clean bottles, pump parts and pump cleaning supplies. Not to mention it’s sleek design and cute gold accents. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin S

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, well made and better than the Amazon "Featured" bag of similar size/set-up
customer_reviews.text: I first got the bag that was listed as "amazon" feature and the quality felt much worse as well as the bag came apart. This bag has far surpassed in durability and to it's credit, I jam a lot of items in the bag. I wish the bag were a little larger and more spacious but that is really only because I take so much with me (Spectra pump, manual pump, Kinde cooler, book, work stuff). Overall I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, space ok
customer_reviews.text: Generally, I like the size of the bag. However, although I’m able to fill it with my pump and some Tupperware I keep my pump parts in, there’s not much room for anything else. It looks good and isn’t obvious that it’s a pump bag. I keep it in my classroom and the students have no clue that it’s not one of my regular bags. I like the colors (black/brown) too. I had read before that the handles kind of split and mine has started to, but it’s not terrible and most people probably don’t notice.
customer_reviews.author: BMW123

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the office
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bag, the side compartments can fit all of my pump accessories. I did think the inner pockets we're a little small, for example I couldn't reach in the pocket to grab my chapstick. I have small hands so I was very surprised by this. Other than that no complaints, I would by this for a friend who worked and pumped in an office setting.
customer_reviews.author: syrk

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Spectra
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m enjoying this bag, using it for my Spectra. Its not too big and has lots of storage. Only complaint is that I’m using Medela cooler bag and it’s a tight fit on other side zipper pocket. Wish I had a little more space to put in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: Working and pumping mom!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very large! But I suppose it needs to be in order to fit everything for back to work. When both side pockets are in use for pump stuff, my laptop and a portfolio can still fit down the sides. Everything else (snacks lunch water bottle) goes on top. Went from an embarrassing five or six bags everyday down to one. Just using a small purse/wallet that I can pull out and carry solo when needed. Just got it, but so far quality seems great!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Medela Pump & Style Advanced
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pump bag that could fit more than my original Medela-branded one that I used with the Freestyle, since the Pump in Style is larger. I love that I don't have to take the pump out of the bag to use it now - it fits perfectly in one of the side compartments and my cooler bag fits fairly well in the other one. I've been able to shove a lot of other stuff into the bag (including an extra cooler bag when I was traveling) with relative ease. Seems to hold together well and zippers function great. Really happy with this bag and glad I picked it vs. some other more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Spectra Breastpump Tote Is HUGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to store my spectra breast pump and accessories. I gave it a 4 star because I expected this bag to be a lot smaller. I was surprised by how big it was. I only wanted a bag for my breast pump and accessories not a bag that would replace my work purse completely. All in all I’ve used it a few times and so far seems to work ok just way to big for my liking
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I can’t stand this bag. Other reviews raced about how much the bad holds and I can barely fit my water bottle in it. It seems cheaply made and I would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and professional
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what I didn't know I needed. Returning to work after maternity leave, I was looking for two bags (pump and laptop). Found this and love it. My Medela pump and 16" laptop, along with everything else from my purse fit neatly. It's a sleek black and doesn't look like a pump bag. I wish the strap was more comfortable, maybe more plush padding because it is quite heavy but otherwise I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Sonnen

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit if you're useing a Spectra pump
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeing to use this for my Spectra pump. The bag was good quality and looking like a nice tote was not an obvious pump bag. However the spectra pump does not fit without force making it difficult to take in and out for use. I ultimately went with another bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: It fits the specta pump, but beware if you get a returned bag.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why others are saying specta pump doesn’t fit because it does in the larger side pocket. That being said not sure how they think you would fit laptop and other work items in bag after putting specta pump in one side and cooler in other because it takes up most of the room inside. Then add your parts and items needed, there isn’t room for anything else. I do like that I can fit my other personal items thou. However, the bag shipped to me and been returned prior as there were breast pads in the pockets, need to have better quality controls for return products.
customer_reviews.author: JI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pump bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fantastic! Everything fits nicely in its separate compartments, comes with a noce pad to set up your pump parts, very discrete, and fashionable for the office. I stuff this bag to the brim, and it is extremely durable. I couldn't recomend a better product. I am so pleased with my purchase. It makes pumping in the office discrete, and makes my life 10 times easier
customer_reviews.author: carifrantz

customer_reviews.title: Great pump bag for pumping on the go!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has been great for pumping in the car and while traveling. It easily fits everything I need including the pump, extra electrical cord, breastmilk bags, breastmilk wipes, receiving blanket, pump parts, cooler with ice pack and bottles. The only thing I would change is to make the zippers on the side compartments double zippers with a loop zipper pull so that you can zip both sides up at once with one hand. Otherwise, I've been very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: Brown is very redish, much larger in person.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this bag but it just didn't look as good in person as online. The brown is extremely reddish, would not match a normal brown you'd see in other bags/shoes/etc. Also, although big, it was very tight trying to fit both a spectra pump and a bottle cooler, with the other work things you'd need to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spectra S2 Pump users: Your search is over!
customer_reviews.text: This is the bag for you! Though many say it may not fit the Spectra S2 pump, don't believe them. It fits very nicely in the side pocket. The interior of the bag fits the extra pieces, plus a "mini fridge" cooler bag that I store the milk in until I get home. I even have room to throw in my salad container or other lunch goodies! It is quite a large bag though - makes it look like you are going away for the weekend - but all the "pluses" outweigh that con. Definitely recommend buying one!
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynYO!

customer_reviews.title: everything you’d want in a bag!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough amazing things about this bag! I read tons of reviews on lots of different bags, and I was in the fence as a first time mom. This bag is AMAZING! Lots of pockets SO conveniently placed, holds both spectra and Medela pump (I have both), holds my cooler bag (and two of them!) plus some bottles and extra random things. It looks great and it’s durable, use it daily for work plus lots of trips both road trips and flying. I LOVE this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Nasser

customer_reviews.title: Fits Spectra!
customer_reviews.text: It does for the Spectra 2! I can leave the pump in the larger side pocket while pumping. Large back stores everything I need for pumping and room for some work/lunch/ personal items. Not in love with the fabric design but oh well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a 17" laptop
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to consolidate work bags, but it does not fit my laptop. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and a tad bulky.
customer_reviews.text: The bag does provide some convenience, but it's still over priced, even being a bit cheaper than the competition. The quality is decent, but it is bulky and cumbersome at times. I like the ease and convenience of having all of my supplies in one place.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so much nicer than I thought it would be. The material is really thick and sturdy and the hardware is beautiful. It fits my spectra with room to spare- although there isn’t a ton of space for anything beyond the pump and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Medela Pump and Cooler Bag Great!
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits my Medela Pump in Style pump with the carrying case perfectly. It also fits the standard square cooler bag that holds (4) 5oz bottles and ice pack. I use this bag daily to and from work and it looks nice enough that non-pumpers probably don't know this is a breast pump bag. The main downside to this bag for me is that the computer compartment is not quite big enough for my 15" laptop. I wish the bag was an inch or so longer. This wasn't a deal-breaker for me though since the pump compartments provide such easy accessibility and the price was right compared to similar bags.
customer_reviews.author: lmorrison

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within a few days.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag with high expectations that it was going to last me a decent amount of time while I tote it to and from work. However, within a few days of putting my supplies in and taking them out after work, I noticed there was a large hole where things I had in the pocket could fall out. I am highly dissatisfied with my purchase, even more so knowing how much I spent. Please take this into consideration when looking to purchase a durable breast bump bag; especially to those new moms, like myself, that do not have an abundance of time to deal with such issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working moms!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I can fit my Spectra pump, accessories, cooler bag, zipper pouch as purse, and 17" laptop for work. It's so great to only have to carry on bag! It's large, but still looks professional.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I just used my bag yesterday for the first time. I really love the look of the bag and that it just fits everything. It’s a really large tote that you can carry all pumping supplies, personal items, and even fit a small cooler inside. My small Lansinoh pump for perfectly in the side compartment and a small medela cooler in the other side compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine D.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the bag, it's stylish and functional. I can quickly find what I need thanks to all the compartments it has.
customer_reviews.author: Cherrydarling06

customer_reviews.title: Great Mommy Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to purchase this bag because the one that came with my pump seemed to be a little too small. It was never any room to keep anything else aside from the pump, which became a problem when I had to take it to work with me. I love this bag because it is large enough to have my pump, an extra bottle or 2, a burp cloth, and I can even throw my wallet or a few diapers if I need to. It's super cute and trendy and nobody really knows what it's used for which is perfect for my mostly male law firm.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie New

customer_reviews.title: Functional bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag was great for transporting my pump to and from work. It was roomy enough for me to hold my purse items and was able to carry my lunch if the bag was unzipped. I only ended up using it for about one month but had no issues with structural integrity.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Huge!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge! It fits my Spectra2 in it comfortably along with the battery pack, back up battery, 4 bottles, 6 phlanges, and 2 sets of hoses! And after fitting all of that in there, there ia still room!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Worthy

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: This bag was much too big, and was more like small carry-on luggage than a pump bag. That being said it looks like it was well made and the design was very cute... It was just way too large for me to keep!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a chance to use this bag yet but it seems like a GREAT value for the price. I struggled with finding a bag that would be large enough to fit my pump, all of the parts, and what I needed for work but this bag seems to meet the mark. It is very spacious and seems like it will work very well! The insulated pockets are large enough to fit a small cooler and my Spectra pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for what I needed. It’s working out better than I thought it would. If you pack it right you can fit the pump and bottle cooler in the same side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough for Spectra S1
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this bag but it doesn't fit my spectra s1 in the side pockets. It also doesn't fit my laptop in the pocket designed for a laptop. It looked like it would be awesome, but getting everything to fit is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: When I got the bag, I liked the pockets and how roomy it was, but when I walked in to work with it on my first day back from mat leave, one of the shorter straps snapped right off. Luckily the other strap held on, and my other arm was free, otherwise the bag could have dropped with my pump in it! Not looking forward to the hassle of returning it and figuring out how to transport my pump now during an already hectic week back to work.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid pumping bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really great for all of the pumping supplies I have - I can fit my medela pump in style, all of the supplies, and ice packs. I was in a conference and this kept the milk cold for almost 12 hours. The only thing is that with ice packs, all of the pumping supplies, and milk, you can’t really fit much else into the bag. However, it is very durable, very sleek, and almost no one knows this is a pump supply bag! I’d definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Clemmons

customer_reviews.title: Great extra large bag!
customer_reviews.text: I recently returned to work and needed a bag that could store three sets of pumping parts as I don't have anywhere to readily wash pump parts at work. As other reviewers have stated, this bag is huge! At first I thought it was too big but it is just the right size to store enough parts for three pumping sessions as well as my bottle storage/cooler bag. My spectra pump fits nicely in the outer lower insulated pocket (note one side is larger than the other and fits the pump nicely). The only thing I'm not in love with is the print. Otherwise this is a great bag!
customer_reviews.author: M. McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Great for working moms
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. New mom loved it. She added a cute scarf and it is great for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pipitone

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke right away
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag but I've only used it 4 times and the handle is already tearing. I don't have anything excessive in it...wallet, pump & parts, lunch and a few other small things. I just ordered a replacement so I'm hoping it was just a fluke because it was only one side of one handle. I'll update my review once I get the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chartier

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this item and very useful. You can take this item anywhere anytime. I have spectrum pump and it is feet in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Komal B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and function
customer_reviews.text: Even though it’s not the highest quality bag, I really do love the size and function. The various pockets are exactly what I need. They easily fit my pump and a large cooler bag. Then there is plenty of room for whatever else you might need. For me, it’s my wallet, my lunch, some snacks, and even a laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie M

customer_reviews.title: Functional breast pump bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to use for returning to work where I would need to pump multiple times per day. The bag is simply and functionally designed. There's plenty of room for my pump along with supplies. I appreciate that the fabric is easy to clean on both the exterior and interior. I would recommend this product for a breast pump bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gold

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have. Large enough to put many things in. Its actually larger than my normal bags (and I buy very large bags as a mother of 2 already). I haven't had my baby yet or returned to work but I'm excited to try it out. I'm a little disappointed as I feel the quality and stitching isnt worth the price but as long as it holds up, I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Q Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pump bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome! Has easy compartments for everything you need! It’s cute! Doesn’t look like an obvious “pump bag”. The price is also just right! I’m a huge fan of this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Spectra
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for the Spectra pump. I can fit my pump, parts, lunch and papers for work in it. After 3 months of typical work use, I took it on a business trip. The shoulder strap broke when carrying it on the flight back. I did have the bag packed (it was heavy), but it was disappointing that it broke :( still works perfectly just carrying to the office every day.
customer_reviews.author: Claire W

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with how big the bag is. It easily fits my pump, pump accessories, diapers, and other must haves for a mother. Very spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Isabbel

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and fits Spectra S2
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described. My Spectra S2 fit nicely in the larger side compartment and my milk cooler fit perfectly in the other one. Large compartment had lots of spare room for my pump parts, lunch and snacks and a bottled water with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Highly Functional
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag! So functional and spacious, I don't know how I went so long without it. Plenty of pockets. I keep my pump, three 8oz Mason jars, a hand towel, my pumping bra, a book, my LaVie breast massaging tools, snacks, and my flanges and bottles in here. Sturdy and makes me life so much easier. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Korie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for my Medela Breast pump!!
customer_reviews.text: i am very excited to use this bag with my new a Medela pump. the bag holds everything i need and has lots of room to spare!!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Best pump bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I used it every day for 5 months for work and travel. Is fit the spectra s1 pump perfectly. The insulated side compartment kept the pumped milk cool for hours (with an ice pack). The middle area is big and with several compartments to keep everything organized. It was easy to clean. I especially loved the clean, sophisticated look.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. My SpeCtra S2 is a little hard to fit in it, but I make it work. The seems around the zipper where my SpeCtra go instantly started to stretch bc it’s just not quite the perfect size. Other than that, this is a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Not functional
customer_reviews.text: The bag doesnt fit much after you put your pump in it. I have the medela and I can hardly zip it after my pump, and pumping necessities are in it, even though it looks huge in person it really doesnt fit much
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like how big it is and the variety of compartments. I just started using this but it is very fashionable and it fits my work things plus pump accessories and cooler
customer_reviews.author: Samantha W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for work!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it doesn’t look like a typical “pump bag”. I like the hidden pockets at the bottoms to insert your pump and parts so when you open the upper portion no one can see them. My Spectra S2 fits great on one side and the other side holds my hands free bra, tube and pump valves, and wall plug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I carry my Ameda Finesse Pump in the middle compartment of this bag and still have enough room for a jar of coconut oil for lubrication, lactation cookies, my wallet, hairbrush, and other miscellaneous items. I store ice packs and milk bags in the side pockets and my bag always looks like it does in the picture. It never looks bulky. Very Satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Lomeli

customer_reviews.title: Best bag without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: So I don’t normally write reviews, but I’m big on reading them. I love this bag I have the Ameda pump and a Spectra pump. It fits both perfect it also fits my Ameda cooler. I’ve taken this bag on 2 trips and to work every day it holds so much stuff and is so discreet nobody knows your carrying a pump around. I love that it came with a little pad, makes placing your parts easier. I have a cousin who is pregnant I def will be recommending this bag when she returns to work. Best bag without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: ebonee ganious

product_meta.title: Breast Pump Bag Tote for Work with Staging Mat Sophisticated Design That Suits Workplace Thermally Lined Compartments Perfect Gift for New Moms (Gray)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars426 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
